Title: Watch: Descendants of Nazis sing 'Am Israel Chai'
Description: Descendants of Nazis and participants in the March of Life movement stand by their Jewish friends during a wave of antisemitism worldwide, spontaneously create a video to show support for the Jewish nation. Watch.
